title: Apartments Tailored to Your Highest Standards
posting_body: Welcome to Envi 2900 where you can make one of our suites your home for a week or beyond.
Envi 2900 invites you to relax in your own personal apartment whether you’re relocating, a business traveler, vacationing, or just looking for a new home.
Give us a call today to get started, our friendly staff is ready to assist you.
Our community proudly features a swimming pool.
We offer Courtesy security patrol.
Our office is open 7 days a week.
NEWLY RENOVATED UNITS!!
•Onsite Maintenance
•Fully Furnished
•Full Size Kitchens
•FREE Utilities (water, sewer and trash)
•FREE Cable TV
•FREE Parking
•Rent Payable Weekly
•No Lease
•Pet friendly (weight and breeding restrictions apply)
We have Studios, 1 bedroom and 2 bedrooms.
Contact us for availability.
Our apartments are bright, clean, boast full sized kitchen appliances, and are fully furnished!
All you bring is your bedding, cooking utensils, personal items and you're good to go.
There are clean & bright laundry facilities on site and plenty of parking.
While you are here let us take care of the utilities and cable TV all included.
Please Contact us with any additional questions.
We look forward to you being our new neighbor!
*Prices subject to change plus applicable taxes and fees.
Equal Housing Opportunities
